title: brOva samayamidE
sahitya:
brOva samayamidE dEvI vini dEvarAjanutA paradEvatA ambA 
bhAvajAri rANI bhakta pAlinI bhavAnI brhadAmbA nanu


caraNam 1    ambujadaLa nayanA vinu bimba nibhAnanA gaja gamanA 
ambikE parAku sEya tagunA bimbAdharI gaurI kundaradanA
    caraNam 2    ambara caravinutA kadambavana priyA shrI lalitA 
kambugaLa vara dAna niratA tumburu nAradanutA sangItaratA
    caraNam 3    shyAmagiri tanayA guNadhAma karadhrta maNI valayA 
sOma kaLAdharI shivapriyA shyAmakrSNNa hrdayAmbuja nilayA
